commitResults.messageTitle: Implement skeletal version of Yale with greet, echo & exit feature
Create ToDoList class and ToDoItem class Store command text in ToDoList, display back to user when requested Change function produceOutput() to performAction() Remove echo() function
commitResults.messageBody:
ToDoList : List Structure to contain multiple ToDoItem
ToDoItem : Represents information of a particular task

Reason: Easier to implement more features and behaviours to do with the tasks.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add new method getItem() in ToDoList class Add new boolean attribute "isMarked" to ToDoItem class Add new methods getStatusIcon(), markItem(), unmarkItem() within ToDoItem class
commitResults.messageBody:
Reason: To abstract the information required so as to ease method calls in main()
and to mark and unmark the tasks.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add chatbot response for unmarkItem() Clean up long lines for better viewing of code
Naming convention: Change class name from ToDoItem to Task, change class name from ToDoList to TaskList
Add ToDo, Deadline, Event classes which are subclasses of Task, Add class variable of Task called totalTasks to keep track of total number of tasks
Split classes into their own respective java files

Create package yalebot, Improve toString() of classes Deadline, Event, Task, Modify performAction() in Yale to cover for "Deadline", "Event" and "ToDo" cases, Add some edge cases to account for marking/unmarking number that doesnt exist, Modify addTo() function in TaskList: adds an item of type Task, Modify listOut() function in TaskList: formats list response message correctly
Remove totalTasks variable since list.getSize() is used to retrieve the total number of tasks
Remove YALE logo due to line break errors in testing, add commands to input.txt, add expected outputs to EXPECTED.txt
Add IndexOutOfBoundsException to mark/unmark, deadline, event and todo features, Add NumberFormatException to mark/unmark feature, Add error message if anything invalid is entered
Add Delete feature along with NumberFormatException and IndexOutOfBoundsException in Yale.java
Add more input commands in input.txt for comprehensive testing
Improve deadline and event feature in Yale.java
Add Javadoc comments to all files
